title: Schwab Internal OSS Starters
summary: Launched Spring Boot starter kits and integration automation to speed teams onto cloud patterns.
problem: Teams duplicated effort building service foundations and cloud integrations, slowing adoption and consistency.
approach: Built Spring Cloud starter templates, codified Eureka/Config/Gateway wiring, and added an event-driven automation framework for integrations.
impact: Faster bootstrap, consistent platform patterns, and recognition in company code-a-thon.
metrics: New services adopted standard starters with reduced setup time
